data.message: aw, its ok marshall :") damn, im very happy right now !! <3 .. i love you legend .. ur always the best idol ! :* :* <3 you know i just celebrated with my friends ur b-day .. :) <3 and that was my happiest day! :"))) <3 love you soooo much <3 :* ya know i went to church to pray 4 you to have a wonderful birthday :) <3 and i hope you're just fine <3 :) always keep smiling and tc  :* <3 xoxoxo #Philippines <3 :)
